Package com.independentid.scim.backend

Interface IResourceModifier

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    PersistStateResource, ScimResource, TransactionRecord
    public interface IResourceModifier
    IResourceModifier defines an interface to a ScimResource which can be used to update or replace a resource.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      boolean checkGetPreConditionFail​(RequestCtx ctx)
      Checks the RequestCtx for If-Not-Match and If-Modified-Since preconditions with the current resource for a match.
      boolean checkModPreConditionFail​(RequestCtx ctx)
      Checks the RequestCtx for If-Match and If-Unmodified-Since preconditions
      boolean isModified()  
      void modifyResource​(JsonPatchRequest req, RequestCtx ctx)
      Accepts a SCIM Patch request (similar to JSON Patch) and processes against the current ScimResource.
      boolean replaceResAttributes​(ScimResource res, RequestCtx ctx)
      Attempts to replace the current resource (subject to attribute mutability) with the specified parsed resource object.

    • Method Detail

      • modifyResource

        void modifyResource​(JsonPatchRequest req,
                    RequestCtx ctx)
             throws ScimException
        Accepts a SCIM Patch request (similar to JSON Patch) and processes against the current ScimResource. If all operations succeed, the current scim object is modified (but not yet persisted) and true is returned. Processing is subject to attribute field mutability.
        Parameters:
        req - A JsonPatchRequest object containing the SCIM Patch request to be performed
        ctx - The RequestCtx providing SCIM request parameters and headers
        Throws:
        ScimException - general processing error such as precondition etc.
        SchemaException - occurs when a violation of scim schema occurs

      • replaceResAttributes

        boolean replaceResAttributes​(ScimResource res,
                             RequestCtx ctx)
                      throws ScimException
        Attempts to replace the current resource (subject to attribute mutability) with the specified parsed resource object. Non-mutable fields are left untouched.
        Parameters:
        res - A parsed ScimResource from the inbound SCIM request to potentially replace the current object
        ctx - The RequestCtx (SCIM params and headers)
        Returns:
        True if the inbound ScimResource was used to replace the current resource.
        Throws:
        ScimException - when a processing error occurs

      • isModified

        boolean isModified()
        Returns:
        true if the resource has been modified and not yet persisted.

      • checkModPreConditionFail

        boolean checkModPreConditionFail​(RequestCtx ctx)
                          throws PreconditionFailException
        Checks the RequestCtx for If-Match and If-Unmodified-Since preconditions
        Parameters:
        ctx - A RequestCtx containing the request headers
        Returns:
        true if preconditions fail
        Throws:
        PreconditionFailException - occurs if the precondition fails

      • checkGetPreConditionFail

        boolean checkGetPreConditionFail​(RequestCtx ctx)
                          throws PreconditionFailException
        Checks the RequestCtx for If-Not-Match and If-Modified-Since preconditions with the current resource for a match. If not matched, false is returned.
        Parameters:
        ctx - A RequestCtx containing the request headers
        Returns:
        true if preconditions fail
        Throws:
        PreconditionFailException - occurs if the precondition fails
